library(ggplot2)

plot1
plot2


rse1 <- addNormalizedAssays(rse)
rse2 <- addNormalizedAssays(rse.exon)


deuBinPlot(rse1, "Alg10b")

summary(rse)

geneBinHeatmap(rse, "Arg2")
